message.content:
{"id": "123036", 
"title": "Bug 123036 Data in a report is doubly stored", 
"description": "Currently, there is a bug where the data in a report is being stored twice.", 
"OB": "The bug is causing the data to be stored twice in the report, resulting in duplication of information.", 
"EB": "The data should only be stored once in the report to avoid duplication.", 
"SR": "The issue needs to be fixed so that the data is stored correctly and is not duplicated in the report."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '123036', 'title': 'Bug 123036 Data in a reprot is doubly stored', 'description': '', 'OB': 'Bug 123036 Data in a reprot is doubly stored We currently stored data twice. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Once in the content stream, once by DtE. '}
